Key Match Events: Shakib Al Hasan runs out Max O'Dowd
Colin Ackermann got his first fifty at a T20 World Cup
Tom Cooper was run out without facing a ball after Nurul Hasan broke the stumps
Nurul Hasan swoops in to break the stumps and run Tom Cooper out for a diamond duck
Taskin Ahmed tries to get an LBW decision going his way
Afif Hossain's direct-hit throw from the deep had Max O'Dowd run out
Two in two: Taskin Ahmed sent back two Dutch batters off the first two balls of the chase
Bas de Leede was out for a first-ball duck
Bas de Leede picked up two wickets
Afif Hossain added impetus to Bangladesh's innings
Paul van Meekeren is pumped after breaking the opening stand
